Name: Season to Taste
Description: Spice the next action you play today twice.

Name: Slice and Dice
Description: Deal 2 damage divided as you choose between any number of enemies.

Name: Fill the Pot
Description:
Deal 2 damage.
If this action was spiced, also recover 3 vitality.

Name: Into the Oven
Description:
Deal 5 damage.
Spice the next action you play today twice.
